Combat Module¶

class combat.Combat_Menu(game, enemy: Enemy)[source]¶

Bases: Menu

A temporary Menu to test Enemy.

attack()[source]¶

Perform an attack on the enemy and check the outcome.

Returns:

The next menu to display based on the outcome.

Return type:

Menu

hitPlayer()[source]¶

Process the enemy’s attack on the player and check the outcome.

Returns:

The next menu to display based on the outcome.

Return type:

Menu

refreshContext()[source]¶

Refresh the context display with updated stats.

special()[source]¶

Use the character’s special ability and check the outcome.

Returns:

The next menu to display based on the outcome.

Return type:

Menu

try_dodge(thing)[source]¶

Attempt to dodge an incoming attack.

Returns:

True if the dodge is successful, False otherwise.

Return type:

bool

verify_health() → int[source]¶

Verify the health status of both the character and the enemy.

Returns:

1 if the enemy is defeated, -1 if the character is defeated, 0 otherwise.

Return type:

int
